Key.Original:
Most of the dynamic objects and their locations are random, player experience may change.

Rrespawn tickets count per player is limited to - 0.

Recommenred game diffictlty settings are:

* Preset: Veteran.
* Detected mines: Hide

Recommenred Addon setttings are:

* ACE Logistics -> Allow Repair = Everyone;
* ACE Medical -> Prevent Instant Death = True;
* ACE Medical -> Locations Boost Training = True; This will allow ordinary soldiers to transfuse blood at hospitals.
Key.English:
Most of the dynamic objects and their locations are random, player experience may change.

Rrespawn tickets count per player is limited to - 0.

Recommenred game diffictlty settings are:

* Preset: Veteran.
* Detected mines: Hide

Recommenred Addon setttings are:

* ACE Logistics -> Allow Repair = Everyone;
* ACE Medical -> Prevent Instant Death = True;
* ACE Medical -> Locations Boost Training = True; This will allow ordinary soldiers to transfuse blood at hospitals.
Key.Russian:
Більшість динамічних об'єктів та їх місцеположення є випадковими, досвід гравця може змінюватися.

Кількість респаунів на гравця - 0.

Рекомендовані налаштування для гри:

* Попередньо встановлені налаштування: Ветеран.
* Виявлені міни: Приховати

Рекомендовані налаштування Додатків:

* ACE Logistics -> Allow Repair = Everyone;
* ACE Medical -> Prevent Instant Death = True;
* ACE Medical -> Locations Boost Training = True; Це дозволить звичайним солдатам переливати кров у шпиталях.

Key.Original: Large tropical island. Has several smaller islands of on the north. Currently under the control of 'Red Sokol' bandits group lead by Moracio Goaz.
Key.English: Large tropical island. Has several smaller islands of on the north. Currently under the control of 'Red Sokol' bandits group lead by Moracio Goaz.
Key.Russian: Великий тропічний острів. Має кілька невеликих островів на півночі. В даний час під контролем бандитів 'Червоного Сокола' очолює Moracio Goaz.

Key.Original: Large tropical island. Has several smaller islands of on the south. Currently under the control of pro American group lead by Rіchardo Gonzales.
Key.English: Large tropical island. Has several smaller islands of on the south. Currently under the control of pro American group lead by Rіchardo Gonzales.
Key.Russian: Великий тропічний острів. Має кілька невеликих островів на півдні. В даний час під контролем про американської групи яку очолює Rіchardo Gonzales.

Key.Original: Your staff is a unit of the 35rd Airmobile Brigade USMC.
Key.English: Your staff is a unit of the 35rd Airmobile Brigade USMC.
Key.Russian: У Вашому розпорядженні особовий склад підрозділу 35-ї аеромобільної бригади США.

Key.Original: Your order: Get to the <marker name = 'wp_air_field_01'>Gurun airfield</marker> and report to the officer. You will have to plan you operation to eliminate the rebel leader Moracio Goaz on the base near the <marker name = 'wp_target_01'>Monuet airfield</marker>.
Key.English: Your order: Get to the <marker name = 'wp_air_field_01'>Gurun airfield</marker> and report to the officer. You will have to plan you operation to eliminate the rebel leader Moracio Goaz on the base near the <marker name = 'wp_target_01'>Monuet airfield</marker>.
Key.Russian: Ваш наказ: Прибути до <marker name='wp_air_field_01'>аеродрому Gurun</marker> та доповісти команидру. Ви повинні спланувати ліквідацію ватажка бунтівників Moracio Goaz на базі біля <marker name='wp_target_01'>аеродрому Monuet</marker>.

Key.Original:
The situation is moderately complex. No active military actions are currently registered.

by brezerk@brezblock.org.ua
Key.English:
The situation is moderately complex. No active military actions are currently registered.

by brezerk@brezblock.org.ua
Key.Russian:
Обстановка складна, помірна. Активних бойових дій на цей час не зареєстровано.

by brezerk@brezblock.org.ua

Key.Original: Eliminate the rebel leader Moracio Goaz on the base near the <marker name = 'wp_target_01'>Monuet airfield</marker>.
Key.English: Eliminate the rebel leader Moracio Goaz on the base near the <marker name = 'wp_target_01'>Monuet airfield</marker>.
Key.Russian: Ліквідувати ватажка бунтівників Moracio Goaz на базі біля <marker name='wp_target_01'>аеродрому Monuet</marker>.

Key.Original: Get to the <marker name = 'wp_air_field_01'>Gurun airfield</marker> and report to the officer.
Key.English: Get to the <marker name = 'wp_air_field_01'>Gurun airfield</marker> and report to the officer.
Key.Russian: Прибути до <marker name='wp_air_field_01'>аеродрому Gurun</marker> та доповісти команидру.

Key.Original: You vaguely remember how you got out of a burning airplane. You think that before you have lost consciousness, you have seen someone else. Are your friends alive? You have to find them.
Key.English: You vaguely remember how you got out of a burning airplane. You think that before you have lost consciousness, you have seen someone else. Are your friends alive? You have to find them.
Key.Russian: Ви смутно пам'ятаєте як вибрались із палаючого літака. Вам здається, що перед тим, як ви втратили свідомість, ви бачили ще когось. Чи живі ваші товариші? Ви повинні знайти їх.

Key.Original: The plane fell somewhere nearby. Trees are making it difficult to find, but I need to try to find it. It is possible that there is something valuable among the rubble. However, the enemy also will search for it. I might be careful.
Key.English: The plane fell somewhere nearby. Trees are making it difficult to find, but I need to try to find it. It is possible that there is something valuable among the rubble. However, the enemy also will search for it. I might be careful.
Key.Russian: Літак впав десь неподалік. Дерева сильно заважать, але потрібно спробувати знайти його. Можливо серед уламків знайдеться щось цінне. Проте ворог теж його шукає. Треба бути обережним.

Key.Original: Everything went wrong. Are we betrayed? What is happening? What to do now? I need information. The big cities are definitely very well guarded, but in small villages such as <marker name = 'wp_minanga'>Minanga</marker>, <marker name = 'wp_monse'>Monse</marker>, <marker name = 'wp_lalomo'>Lalomo</marker> or <marker name = 'wp_apal'>Apal</marker> I should be able to find some information for sure.
Key.English: Everything went wrong. Are we betrayed? What is happening? What to do now? I need information. The big cities are definitely very well guarded, but in small villages such as <marker name = 'wp_minanga'>Minanga</marker>, <marker name = 'wp_monse'>Monse</marker>, <marker name = 'wp_lalomo'>Lalomo</marker> or <marker name = 'wp_apal'>Apal</marker> I should be able to find some information for sure.
Key.Russian: Все пішло шкереберть. Нас зрадили? Що коїться? Що тепер робити? Потрібна інформація. Великі міста напевно дуже добре охороняються, але в невеличких селах таких як <marker name = 'wp_minanga'>Minanga</marker>, <marker name = 'wp_Monse'>Monse</marker>, <marker name = 'wp_lalomo'>Lalomo</marker> або <marker name = 'wp_apal'>Apal</marker> я зможу знайти якусь інформацію.

Key.Original: AOC is messing the things. Their air defense battery covers the island. We need to destroy <marker name = 'wp_aa'>it</marker>.
Key.English: AOC is messing the things. Their air defense battery covers the island. We need to destroy <marker name = 'wp_aa'>it</marker>.
Key.Russian: AOC влізле не в своє діло. Їх батарея ППО прикриває острів. Нам потрібно вивести <marker name = 'wp_aa'>ППО</marker> з ладу.

Key.Original: AOC is coordinating communication between Solomon Maru's thug groups. We need to destroy the <marker name = 'wp_aa'>communication tower</marker>.
Key.English: AOC is coordinating communication between Solomon Maru's thug groups. We need to destroy the <marker name = 'wp_aa'>communication tower</marker>.
Key.Russian: AOC координую зв'язок між бандами Solomon Maru. Потрібно вивести <marker name = 'wp_aa'>комунікаційну вежу</marker> з ладу.

Key.Original: Solomon Maru is a leader of the "Red Sokol" group. Under the guise of AOC forces, his gangsters killed Rіchardo Gonzales and cut the whole city <marker name = 'wp_kambani'>Kambani</marker>. In the latter, it was seen on the <marker name='wp_air_field_01'>Gurun airfield</marker> with a bunch of his bandits.
Key.English: Solomon Maru is a leader of the "Red Sokol" group. Under the guise of AOC forces, his gangsters killed Rіchardo Gonzales and cut the whole city <marker name = 'wp_kambani'>Kambani</marker>. In the latter, it was seen on the <marker name='wp_air_field_01'>Gurun airfield</marker> with a bunch of his bandits.
Key.Russian: Solomon Maru -- лідер угруппованя "Червоні Соколи". Під прикриттям сил AOC його бандити вбили президента Rіchardo Gonzales і вирізали ціле місто <marker name = 'wp_kambani'>Kambani</marker>. В останне його бачили на <marker name='wp_air_field_01'>аеродромі Gurun</marker> з купою охорони.

Key.Original: Our air defense battery covers the island. We need to defend <marker name = 'wp_aa'>it</marker>.
Key.English: Our air defense battery covers the island. We need to defend <marker name = 'wp_aa'>it</marker>.
Key.Russian: Наша батарея ППО прикриває острів. Нам потрібно захистити <marker name = 'wp_aa'>ППО</marker>.

Key.Original: We took down US military plane. Couple survivors are scattered over the island. Find and eliminate them.
Key.English: We took down US military plane. Couple survivors are scattered over the island. Find and eliminate them.
Key.Russian: Ми збили американський військовий літак. Декілька виживших розкидані по острову. Знайдіть і усуньте їх.

Key.Original: Last storm sunk cargo ship. There were some rumors about carrying weapons on this boat. I have to find diving equipment and check the wreckage. But I need to be careful and avoid patrol boats.
Key.English: Last storm sunk cargo ship. There were some rumors about carrying weapons on this boat. I have to find diving equipment and check the wreckage. But I need to be careful and avoid patrol boats.
Key.Russian: У минулий шторм затонув вантажний корабель. Продукують, що на цьому човні перевозили зброю. Я повинен знайти водолазне обладнання та перевірити уламки. Але потрібно бути обережним і уникати патрульних катерів.

Key.Original: I need to check the police station. Police are very relaxed this days and maybe I will be able to steal some weapon.
Key.English: I need to check the police station. Police are very relaxed this days and maybe I will be able to steal some weapon.
Key.Russian: Потрібно перевірити поліцейський участок. Поліція дуже розслабилась і можливо я зможу поцупити якусь зброю.

Key.Original: Last storm sunk cargo ship. There were some rumors about carrying weapons on this boat. I have to find diving equipment and check the wreckage. But I need to be careful and avoid patrol boats.
Key.English: Last storm sunk cargo ship. There were some rumors about carrying weapons on this boat. I have to find diving equipment and check the wreckage. But I need to be careful and avoid patrol boats.
Key.Russian: У минулий шторм затонув вантажний корабель. Продукують, що на цьому човні перевозили зброю. Я повинен знайти водолазне обладнання та перевірити уламки. Але потрібно бути обережним і уникати патрульних катерів.

Key.Original: Last storm sunk cargo ship. There were some rumors about carrying weapons on this boat. I have to find diving equipment and check the wreckage. But I need to be careful and avoid patrol boats.
Key.English: Last storm sunk cargo ship. There were some rumors about carrying weapons on this boat. I have to find diving equipment and check the wreckage. But I need to be careful and avoid patrol boats.
Key.Russian: У минулий шторм затонув вантажний корабель. Продукують, що на цьому човні перевозили зброю. Я повинен знайти водолазне обладнання та перевірити уламки. Але потрібно бути обережним і уникати патрульних катерів.

Key.Original: Last storm sunk cargo ship. There were some rumors about carrying weapons on this boat. I have to find diving equipment and check the wreckage. But I need to be careful and avoid patrol boats.
Key.English: Last storm sunk cargo ship. There were some rumors about carrying weapons on this boat. I have to find diving equipment and check the wreckage. But I need to be careful and avoid patrol boats.
Key.Russian: У минулий шторм затонув вантажний корабель. Продукують, що на цьому човні перевозили зброю. Я повинен знайти водолазне обладнання та перевірити уламки. Але потрібно бути обережним і уникати патрульних катерів.

Key.Original: Welcome on board to AF101. Buckle up,
Key.English: Welcome on board to AF101. Buckle up,
Key.Russian: Вітаємо на борту AF101. Пристебніть ремені,

Key.Original: Our flight will take an hour. Take a nap.
Key.English: Our flight will take an hour. Take a nap.

Key.Original: We are inbound and ready for landing. How copy?
Key.English: We are inbound and ready for landing. How copy?
Key.Russian: Ми вже прибули і готові до приземлення. Як прийняли?

Key.Original: The game is locked. Try again later.
Key.English: The game is locked. Try again later.

Key.Original: US Assault group was eliminated. AOC and Bandit groups are controlling Pulau islands for now.
Key.English: US Assault group was eliminated. AOC and Bandit groups are controlling Pulau islands for now. Штурмову группу США було ліквідовано. Сили AOC разом з группами бандитів контролюють острови Пулау і по цей день.

Key.Original: US Assault group was eliminated. AOC and Bandit groups are controlling Pulau islands for now.
Key.English: US Assault group was eliminated. AOC and Bandit groups are controlling Pulau islands for now. Штурмову группу США було ліквідовано. Сили AOC разом з группами бандитів контролюють острови Пулау.

Key.Original: US Assault group was eliminated. AOC and Bandit groups are controlling Pulau islands for now.
Key.English: US Assault group was eliminated. AOC and Bandit groups are controlling Pulau islands for now. Штурмову группу США було ліквідовано. Сили AOC разом з группами бандитів контролюють острови Пулау і по цей день.
